thread_replies.author: acervo juquinha
thread_replies.text: try to find a cast as charismatic and engaged as these three graces from the last 10 years on Globo's soap operas and fail miserably

- Leo depressed because of Viviane
- Ligia dying from so much coughing
- Gerluce getting into a fistfight with her dad
- Zenilda seeing Rogério
- Raul almost being killed

Meanwhile Lorena and Juquinha:
